sentences.en: Semi - final Wang Hao with the Gelinka internecine strife , Malone will have encountered the Pohl.
sentences.cn: 半决赛 王皓将与格林卡火拼, 马龙则遭遇了波尔.

sentences.en: Strife was internecine during the next fortnight.
sentences.cn: 在以后两个星期的冲突中我们两败俱伤.

sentences.en: The internecine strife was caused by a shortage of food.
sentences.cn: 这次内部冲突，是由于食物匮乏而引致的。

sentences.en: When they realize they face extremity, the victims will take an internecine measure to help them.
sentences.cn: 在意识到面临绝境的时候, 村民很可能采取“两败俱伤”的自力救济行为.

words.tran_cn: 两败俱伤的；互相残杀的；致命的

trans.tran_en: internecine fighting or struggles happen between members of the same group or nation
